title: Constructivist-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Strengthening Program

context.additional_context: Self-directed learning competency enhancement program for learners with social challenges

learning_goals: Students transform real-life problems into mathematical models and apply at least three solution strategies.
Students provide peer feedback during mathematical problem-solving processes at over 80% implementation through small-group collaboration.
Students establish self-directed learning plans and implement them at over 70% adherence for four weeks post-course completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
